Name: Fragment of a relief with bark procession
Description: Fragment of a wall with the incomplete representation of a festival bark being carried by priests. In the middle of the bark is a richly decorated shrine; above a vulture is hovering, then Osiris in his naos protected by a winged goddess; underneath are three kneeling divinities with jackal's heads ("the souls of Buto"). Next to the shrine is a kneeling man.
